articles.title: Alex Clippinger
articles.contents:
Alex Clippinger
          
          
          About

              Alex Clippinger
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About Me
            I graduated from Northeastern University in Boston, MA in 2019 with a Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics and Economics. After college, I spent the next year working in catastrophe risk modeling, where I gained exposure to the applications of data science to environmental applications. I earned a Graduate Certificate in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) in 2021 and began pursuing a career combining environmental science and data. Most recently, I was a geospatial analyst at Sentera, where I used GIS, remote sensing, and machine learning tools to analyze in-season agriculture data from drone imagery. As a Master of Environmental Data Science (MEDS) student at the UCSB Bren School of Environmental Science and Management, I hope to learn the necessary skills to take on difficult environmental challenges with an increasing demand for data-intensive solutions. 
            
            
            Education
             Master of Environmental Data Science (Expected June 2022), Bren School of Environmental Science & Management, University of California, Santa Barbara - Santa Barbara, CA
             Graduate Certificate (April 2021), Northeastern University - Boston, MA
             Bachelor of Science in Economics and Mathematics (December 2019), Northeastern University - Boston, MA 
            
            
            Currently
            Data Scientist (Part-Time) @ RDN, Inc. 
            Graduate Student @ Bren School of Environmental Science & Management 
            Teaching Assistant @ UCSB Department of Economics
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Alex Clippinger
